sentences.english: Love, is something more wonderful and bitterer than living by oneself.
sentences.chinese: 愛，是比一個人生活更精彩又更悽苦的事情。

sentences.english: Labor poetry, the words express the country seen their homes destroyed more than the miserable death.
sentences.chinese: 工詩詞，其詞多表達國破家亡之悽苦。

sentences.english: The experience has turned him into a sad man.
sentences.chinese: 經歷此事之後，他變成了一個悽苦的人。
同着數不盡的奴隸的悽苦。

sentences.english: Elegant emotional expression and miserable chants constitute "everlasting symphony".
sentences.chinese: 優美的抒情與悽苦的詠歎構成了永遠的“交響”。
